cards.question: What is Amazon Rekognition used for?
cards.answer: Image and video analysis - object detection, facial recognition, text extraction

cards.question: What does Amazon Comprehend do?
cards.answer: Natural language processing - sentiment analysis, entity extraction, language detection

cards.question: What is Amazon Polly?
cards.answer: Text-to-speech service that converts text into lifelike speech

cards.question: What is Amazon Transcribe?
cards.answer: Speech-to-text service that converts audio to text with timestamps

cards.question: What is Amazon Translate used for?
cards.answer: Real-time language translation service supporting 75+ languages
